transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji.
Customer: Hello, Sunil ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Haanji. Filma baat kar rahi hoon sir IndiaMART head office se.
Executive: Ji mam boliye.
Customer: Ji. Actually sir kal aapki baat hui thi Arunima ji se service sorry Praveen ji se aapki services ko baat hui thi sir. To aapne not satisfied diya tha sir. To maine usi context mein aapko call kiya tha sir. Kya ho gaya aapne not satisfied kyun diya tha?
Customer: Mam mere paas ye laga six months se humne registration kar rakhi hai aapki aapke paas.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Six months ho chuke mere ko ek bhi IndiaMART se mere ek bhi inquiry nahi aayi abhi tak.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan. Matlab six month mein pura Ambala district ki ek bhi inquiry nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aur jis din humne pehle package liya tha us din se maine jis din package liya tha sabse pehle yahi bola tha bhai mere ko Ambala ho gaya Ambala main to Ambala 40 kilometer Ambala surrounding 40 50 kilometer tak ka area hum cover kar sakte hain isme liquid material cement ka hai.
At least cement based material hai liquid isko jyada lead settlement hogi jyada lead leke jayenge.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To aaj tak mere ko ek inquiry nahi aayi aapke IndiaMART se yahi dunga to fir kya kahunga. Bar bar madam bhumika madam ka phone aata hai ji main karwa deti hoon karwa deti hoon wo hai hota hai nahi to is plan humne to yahi bolte hain hum to hai hi nahi na aapka registration karate is cheez ko.
Executive: Achcha. Thik hai. Sir mujhe ye bataiyega aap keh rahe the inquiry nahi aa rahi hai.
To main dekh rahi thi aapka Rajpura se inquiry aayi thi aapko aur Patiala se.
Customer: Rajpura koi inquiry nahi hai mam uske baad nahi nahi suno us customer se meri baat hui thi wo keh raha hai already hamara dal chuka hai jab inquiry dali hum dal chuka tha keh raha meri dal chuki hai concrete ko.
Executive: Achcha. Aap inquiry keh rahe hain na sir jo direct inquiry jo aati hai usi ki baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Haan haan mam Rajpura ki Rajpura ki haan haan suno suno Rajpura ki do teen inquiry thi mere paas aayi mere paas hai note mein aur jab inquiry aayi log keh rahe hain humne to already dal wali agli ye to teen din pehle do din pehle dal chuki hai concrete uske baad inquiry generate hui hai.
Executive: Achcha. Haan. Achcha.
Executive: Waise to sir aisa hota nahi kyunki customer agar inquiry kar raha hai to wo direct usi din hi usi.
Customer: Mam aap aap Rajpura ka aap dekh dekh bhi rahe honge maine call bhi ki hai Rajpura ke customer ko jo bhi hai aap check bhi kare honge ki unko call bhi ki hui hai meri.
Executive: Aur sir ye jo local mein to hum Patiala nahi hamari range mein nahi aati Patiala.
Executive: Patiala to aap hi ka area hai sir yahan pe.
Customer: Nahi nahi ek ek mam area Patiala hai mera jahan plant hai Patiala mere plant se 70 kilometer door hai.
Executive: Achcha okay matlab GST jo Patiala ka hi dikha raha hai hume.
Customer: Haan GST mera nahi nahi GST GST mera Patiala ka hai lekin jo wahan jo mera kaam ho raha hai na wahan dusri jagah par hai Mohali district mein kaam ho raha hai.
Executive: Hmm. Achcha.
Customer: Jo humne Jinderni sarward ko registration kara rakha hai na ye hamara jo kaam hai GST number ye hai lekin shifting to Mohali wahan 70 kilometer side hai jahan ye apna plant hai mera.
Executive: Achcha. Sir to mujhe ye bataiyega.
Customer: Mere ko dekho Kharad Kharad Kharad bhi door padta hai mere ko aap ye lagao Kharad ho gaya Patiala ho gaya agar Fatehgarh Sahib Govindgarh ye hamare se door pad jata bahut kafi.
Executive: Sangrur sir Sangrur ka area?
Customer: Hain? Sangrur to bahut door hai Sangrur Sangrur Sangrur?
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan. 100 kilometer hai ji.
Executive: To ye area to aata hua na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi 150 kilometer door hai ji Sangrur.
Executive: Achcha to aapko kitne kilometer area mein batao meri baat batata hoon mere paas inquiry wo aati hai Delhi Noida Faridabad Gurgaon wo to inquiry duniya bhar ki hai lekin wahan aap jaate hi nahi wahan kuch kaam hi nahi hamara.
Executive: Sir aap filter lagate hain upar location ka.
Customer: Haan lagate hain bhi Ambala ki location upar dalo ek dekh lo aap check karo.
Executive: Aap relevant mein lagate hoge to relevant mein aap Punjab ka filter lagate hoge sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi main Ambala Ambala hi dalta hoon only bas.
Executive: Sir Ambala Ambala to hum dala hi nahi Punjab ko humne jitni registration Punjab ko to likha hi nahi hai bhai Punjab ki hamari koi inquiry hai.
Executive: Achcha. Sir sirf Ambala se agar aap dhundoge to fir to dekhiye lead milna mushkil hogi sir. Thik hai aapko thoda sa Punjab ka area.
Customer: Punjab ke area mein dikkat kya hai ki jo Punjab hamari range mein nahi aata wahan kahan jayenge hum matlab ye baat samjho. Achcha. Haan matlab aapko bataya na aisa material hai agar use ek ghante mein isko khade kar do na gaddi settle ho jayega gaddi ke andar hi.
Executive: Achcha. Sir ye sab area Bhatinda Ludhiana aur yahan pe Faridkot Firozpur.
Customer: Aap to aap to aap to range hai sab mam ye. Aap Ambala ke Bhatinda location dalo 220 kilometer distance hai. Ludhiana 120 kilometer hai.
Executive: Achcha. To aapko sir proper proper sirf Ambala se chahiye.
Customer: Ambala meri na traveling gaddi ki jyada ek ghante ki movement hai bas ek ghante ke liye ek ghante ki movement hai jo ek se dedh ghanta lagta hai gaddi ko isse jyada movement kar nahi sakti.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm. Okay thik hai to hume sirf matlab Ambala ke bahar nahi chahiye hume sirf Ambala tak hi matlab chahiye uske bahar hum nahi karenge.
Executive: Nahi nahi uske baad. Achcha okay sir jitne bhi aapke product hai un sab mein sirf isi area mein karna hai hume.
Customer: Haan isi area mein jyada aur product mein search kar aur product bhi interlocking tile hai pavers hai to inki to inquiry aati nahi hai inki to koi inquiry aati nahi hai isme khas.
Executive: Achcha. Customer: Ye bhi inka bhi area 40 80 kilometer chal jayegi iske inka bhi ek area distance hai 40 80 80 70 80 kilometer ke area surrounding range kar sakte hain jaise aapka Mohali ho gaya Mohali aa jayega hamara pura aapka Patiala tak bhi chal jata hai Patiala tak bhi ho jata hai.
Executive: Kaun se product mein sir?
Customer: Interlocking pavers tile likhi hoga dekho.
Executive: Interlock pavers. Haan haan haan. Thik hai sir main check kar le rahi hoon. Interlocking ka interlocking ka sir yahan pe Moga Ludhiana yahan ho sakta hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi door hai. Jalandhar Ludhiana Ludhiana walon ko bhi mil jati hai utni transportation pad jati hai.
Executive: Sir aisa karte hain ek bar aap system pe aa sakte hain sir?
Customer: Nahi abhi to nahi aayenge mam to aaj wo hai sara yahan pe hamare yahan band hai kal kar lijiye mere ko call.
Executive: Monday ko Monday ko aa sakte hain sir?
Customer: Haan haan Monday aa jayenge Monday aa jayenge. Thik hai to ek bar Monday kitne baje call kar sakte hain aap system pe aate main samajh ke aur usi time kuch achi leads aapko consume karwaun sir.
Customer: 10 11 baje kar lena.
Executive: 10 11 baje thik hai to main 11 baje aapko call karti hoon sir detail mein iska jo jo leads hai wo main aapko usi time consume karwaungi inquiry hai usko karunga agar catalog mein kahin pe kuch hoga kyunki sir aapka area bahut limited hai Ambala ka area hai sir thik hai par aap keh rahe ho ki ye interlocking wala jo product hai aapka interlocking paver blocks thik hai usme hum thoda sa area apna expand kar sakte hain matlab Patiala aur ye sab area mein to hum uska bhi lead utha ke dekhte hain sir thik hai thoda sa area ka hai sir is vajah se aa raha hai thik hai main aapko Monday ko call karti hoon sir 10:30 baje tak ek bar hum discuss karte hain thik hai main aapko apne personal number se abhi message karti hoon sir. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any buyleads in 6 months.

- Inquiries received are for already completed projects.

- Wants leads only from Ambala district.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the limited scope of Ambala area.

- Executive offered to check interlocking pavers leads.

- Executive will call on Monday to discuss leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday at 11:00 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, area
